sentences.english: Our factory has spared no cost to manufacture artificial limBs in order to serve disaBled people.
sentences.chinese: 本廠不惜工本製造假肢，爲殘疾人服務。

sentences.english: Everything from prothetic limbs to pre-fabricated houses will be made using similar printing technology.
sentences.chinese: 從醫用假肢到預製房屋，3D打印技術可謂無處不在。

sentences.english: He was using a transfemoral prosthesis with silicone liner and partial suction with a total elastic support belt for additional suspension.
sentences.chinese: 配帶硅膠假肢和局部吸附用全支持帶增加懸吊。

sentences.english: He wore short pants and had a wooden leg.
sentences.chinese: 他穿着短褲頭，其中一條腿安着假肢。

sentences.english: Today, wearing a prosthetic arm, Aron Ralston still climbs mountains and explores canyons.
sentences.chinese: 今天，穿着假肢，阿隆羅爾斯頓仍然上山，探索峽谷。

sentences.english: A few months in, Kazazic received her first artificial leg.
sentences.chinese: 在幾個月內，卡扎迪克收到了她的第一個假肢。

sentences.english: Left, Yin Xue, 9, practiced walking with her prosthetic leg.
sentences.chinese: 圖爲9歲的林薛學着使用假肢走路。

sentences.english: People with heart pacemaker and artificial limb are not allowed in the working area.
sentences.chinese: 在工作區裏不允許帶心臟起博器和有假肢的人進來。

definition: exoskeleton (the carapace of insects, crabs etc)
assistive device (walking frame, hearing aid etc)
